name: Derro, Hellforged
description: The Derro, Hellforged is a small yet formidable humanoid with a robust armor and a menacing appearance, characterized by its fire-affinities and resilience in combat.
memorable: Its ability to ignite targets with hellfire and command enemies adds a unique tactical layer.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate foes and harness the power of fire in their attacks.
relations: Often associated with other derro or fiendish creatures, can be found in dark, underground environments.
environment: Commonly found in underground realms, often among fire or evil-aligned entities.
strengths: Possesses resistance to fire, poison, and damage from non-silvered weapon attacks, with powerful fire-based abilities.
weaknesses: Impaired performance in bright sunlight with disadvantage on attacks and perception checks.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack, using a battleaxe for melee damage or hurling hellfire as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Hellfire Weapons ability allows it to deal extra fire damage with each weapon attack, igniting and damaging foes over time.
skills: Has a low passive perception of 7, struggling to notice threats.
additional_information: Advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
Damage immunities to fire and poison.
Uses tactical commands in battle to control opponents.
Can create opportunities for strategic retreats or attacks.
test_queries: derro creature with magical weapon skills
